title: Find BJJ Classes
description: Search for Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu classes by location, date, instructor, and more.
honolulu_description: Find Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu classes in Honolulu, Hawaii. Search by academy, class type, and day of the week.
tokyo_description: Find Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu classes in Tokyo, Japan. Search by academy, class type, and day of the week.
serviceDescription: BJJ Schedule App is a centralized platform for Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu class schedules worldwide, making it easy to find and browse classes by location, time, academy, and instructor.
feature1Description: Search for BJJ classes by region, day of week, class type, and more.
feature2Description: View detailed information about academies, instructor profiles, and class content.
feature3Description: We regularly update our schedules with the latest information from academies.
noResultsMessage: No classes match your search criteria. Try adjusting your filters.
noClassesAvailable: No classes available for this academy
mapViewPlaceholder: Map view will be available soon
calendarViewPlaceholder: Calendar view will be available soon
